reviews.title: good value
reviews.text: This is a good base for Antwerp.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Pros: clean, spacious, nespresso machine/minibar, quiet, and price. Good location. Were helpful when i asked for milk for the fridge and helpful recommendations for things to do.
reviews.title: Highly recommended!!

likes.liked: — The service and the size of the room(s)

reviews.text: Cons: the bedroom was blocked from real light by the bathroom walls so the bedroom was in day long darkness while the living area was sunny; bathroom was a bit small and no bathtub, could have done with more/better cheeses for the breakfast (fridge only had mean little "plastic" cheese packets and no salamis). you also have to pay on your first night which i think is odd - do they think we wld skip out and not pay at check out?
reviews.title: What a find!
A fantastic and comfortable stay!
reviews.text: make sure you rent bicycles in antwerp as a great way to get around. and visit the Fiskebar restaurant for seafood.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Picked this hotel for our two day stay in Antwerpe based on previous Tripadvisor reviews. Was not disappointed at all! Stayed in a rooftop apartment. Huge space (twice the size if not more of any standard hotel I have ever stayed in Europe), nicely stocked fridge/kitchen and absolutely wonderful service. Fresh croissants were delivered to our door in the mornings. There was a set of stairs to get to our apartment, so if that is an issue for you, you may not want to book the upper rooms...but we loved it. Our only regret was not staying longer!
reviews.title: Fantastic stay at Britselei 37

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Booked this hotel because of tripadvisor reviews. I agree with all of them. The apartments were beautifully decorated and furnished, service excellent. Would not hesitate to recommend.
reviews.title: Beautiful rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A super hotel to stay in while in antwerp. stayed for two nights and i could not have been more happy with my choice. Used the reviews from tripadvisor when booking and they were spot on. Very classy rooms, modern and spacious and luxurious. Extremely helpful english lady owner who has loads of time for you, with helpful suggestions where to go, where to eat, where not to go, where to buy diamonds. I proposed to my girlfriend in a little garden she recommended, had the ring made, all in three days but was extremely happy and cannot say enough good things about Britselei 37.
reviews.title: excellent hotel
Fine
reviews.text: Warm, friendly and pretty much immaculately 4 star. Everything works, is of good quality and carefully chosen. This place has been put together by people with a properly critical eye in a category where complacency often rules. .

reviews.title: Fantastic Apartments
reviews.text: A little walk from the centre but nothing onerous. Very close to Cafe Momboko which is a great place to relax between galleries. Great Lebanese "sandwiches."

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For dinner "Hecker" is adventurous and interesting food.
reviews.title: Wonderful Property

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about Britselei 37.
reviews.title: Amazing Antwerpen Experience!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The family is AMAZING. They told us of all the must-dos in Antwerp, and where we would find great Antwerpen restaurants, shops, chocolates, etc.
reviews.title: Great place to stay

likes.liked: — Very friendly, helpful people working there

reviews.text: The croissant fairy comes every morning with a bag filled with deliciousness!!! I one day ate 3 croissants. And the complimentary beverages, snacks and breads make you feel like you're coming home.
reviews.title: Impossible to fault

likes.liked: — Style, space (compared with similar price hotel room) and warmth of welcome

reviews.title: Lovely place
reviews.text: The room was really really much larger than I had expected and immaculate.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Antwerp Apartments for three nights in March.
reviews.title: Very Nice
Stylish City Break
reviews.text: We stayed in the Chocolate Box room (a 'junior apartment') which was nicely decorated and very clean. The only problem we had was the noise - first thing in the morning we were woken with noise from the street, noise from the communal stairwell, and a lot of noise from walking and hoovering in the apartment above. Not very good on a holiday break when you want to have a bit of a lie in.

The service was good, they cleaned the apartment even when we left after 12pm which we were not expecting. We also appreciated the talk through of the map of the city when we got there. A minor problem was we weren't able to leave our bags there on the day we left because apparently there would have been no one there when we wanted to collect them at 6pm. It wasn't a big inconvenience as the train station isn't far, but this is something you expect that you're able to do. We weren't sure if we should treat the place as apartments or a hotel, they cleaned like a hotel but then when we expected to leave the bags like in a hotel it wasn't possible. Also a good idea would be for them to have 'do not disturb' signs for the doors, because as we were taking it easy and leaving late in the morning, every day the cleaner tried walking into the apartment when we were still there. Good thing we remembered to lock the door.
reviews.title: Best Hotel Antwerp

reviews.text: All in all a nice experience. I think the reviews on here give too high a level of expectation. The place is very nice, but not the best place you will ever stay in. If we were to go back I would request a room on a higher level that would maybe have less noise.
reviews.title: Spolied in Antwerp !

likes.liked: — Attention to detail by the owners

reviews.title: Incredible Atmosphere
reviews.text: Antwerp itself is fantastic. Very cool with great bars, restaurants and shopping. We had a wonderful time. The people in Antwerp were really friendly, helpful and nice the whole time. As we obviously don't know Flemish, they were all happy to help with the language and speak English. We can definitely recommend the restaurant Zoro on Leopold Plaats near the apartments, and Maritime for great seafood (it looks a bit dull from the outside but go in, it's amazing, and the staff are fab). A great place for a weekend break.
